name: favorite-movies
description: Full-stack favorite movies list app - NestJS + React + TypeScript + PostgreSQL

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:create && npm run db:seed
